Welcome to Pulling Threads, a blog about how to make the most of the R packages `phyf` and `fibre`. Together these R packages help you perform phylogenetic comparative analysis with a fast and flexible modelling framework. I (the developer: Russell Dinnage) post tutorials here periodically, so keep checking back!
